attributes.additional_details:
A commemorative
Medal should be struck and awarded to those who made the Olympic and Paralympic games.
The all Team GB athletes, for their visible representation of the nation.
To the Armed Forces who helped to make the games safe.
The LOCOG Team for the planning and delivery.
But most importantly to the volenteers, the Performers, the GamesMakers and the Ambassadors who made the games what they were.
